src.nlp.masked_language_model_training module¶

Description:

This script is used for training the MLM model. It is based on the HuggingFace Trainer class. The model is trained on the mtsamples dataset.

src.nlp.masked_language_model_training.load_datasets(data_path: str) → tuple[datasets.arrow_dataset.Dataset, datasets.arrow_dataset.Dataset]¶

Load the datasets

Parameters:

data_path (str) – Path to the dataset

Returns:

The train and validation datasets

Return type:

tuple[Dataset, Dataset]

src.nlp.masked_language_model_training.load_model(device: device) → BertForMaskedLM¶

Load the model from the checkpoint directory

Parameters:

device (torch.device) – The device to load the model to

Returns:

The model

Return type:

BertForMaskedLM

  • tokenizer (AutoTokenizer) – The tokenizer to use
